channel.title: Comments on: Episode #58: The Art of the Deal

item.title: By: richard mullens
item.dc:creator: richard mullens
item.description: But his opinions mark him out asd being an arsehole - irrespective of the quality of his suits
item.content:encoded: But his opinions mark him out asd being an arsehole – irrespective of the quality of his suits

item.title: By: Robert
item.dc:creator: Robert
item.description: Trace is great, but his claim that the field of "economics" is limited to Mises, Rothbard, Hayek et al is preposterous.
item.content:encoded: Trace is great, but his claim that the field of “economics” is limited to Mises, Rothbard, Hayek et al is preposterous.
